synopsis.text: Robot pilots Goh Saruwatari and Anna Aoi find themselves in the midst of a battle for Earth's survival against an alien force known as the Mimetic Beasts. Five years ago, Goh and Anna met during a fierce battle, where Goh saved Anna's life. Since then, they have fallen in love and decided to marry. However, on their wedding day, the Mimetic Beasts return, forcing Goh to leave Anna at the altar and defend Earth. In a desperate attempt to save her fiance, Anna discovers a top-secret robot called Neo-Okusaer, which merges with Goh's spaceship Dannar to create the powerful Godannar. As the battle against the Mimetic Beasts intensifies, Goh and Anna must overcome personal obstacles and fight together to save Earth and their love. Will they be able to defeat the alien threat and finally get married? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
